Reorganizing my activity sheet

Jan 21, 2017

I want to make it easier for people to view my activity sheet without having to click through each title to view a post.

So I'm using Jekyll's excerpt mechanism to show each post on the home page. I'm also going to need to restyle the posts a little bit to make a clear visual transition between posts.

I only got a few hours of sleep last night so I'll tackle that tomorrow.
